ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Charm
ygData.msgSnippet: aye a bard in my guild was charming Azaracks in Sky last night.  i was thinking of taking Quag on a killing spree, i never thought of Dino.  only problem with
ygData.messageBody:
aye a bard in my guild was charming Azaracks in Sky last night. i was
thinking of taking Quag on a killing spree, i never thought of Dino. only
problem with these things is running out of mana and not being able to
finish off your pet. i lose about 1/2 bubb of mana for every 2 seafuries i
kill. so hopefully they will just up the mana a little rather than reduce
the song's effectiveness.

also you can not recharm before it wears off as someone told John.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L49 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> >>PLEASE Don't do this to high profile mobs :( You'll get it
> nerfed :(
> >>
> >>~ L
